name: trans Slack Bot demo
description: A translation bot for Slack that translates a message when a user reacted with an emoji (The specifications are based on reacjilator: https://github.com/slackAPI/reacjilator)

ARXIV_CHECK_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID for posting paper from arXiv

ARXIV_CHECK_FROM_DAYS_BEFORE.description: Search start date (in days from now)

ARXIV_CHECK_ONLY_NEW_ARTICLES.description: When this parameter is set to ON, papers after the time of the latest message posted on the channel are searched

ARXIV_CHECK_TRANS.description: Translation target language code ('ja' for Japanese), if this value is empty, no translation will be performed
